> Find the square root of a modulo the 2048-bit prime p. Give the smaller of the two roots as your answer.

[Tonelli-Shanks Algorithm Implement](<(https://sean9892.github.io/2020/11/20/TONELLI-SHANKS/)>)

```
def tonelli_shanks(n,p):
    def isQR(x,p):
        return pow(x,(p-1)//2,p)==1
    if not isQR(n,p):
        return -1
    Q,S=p-1,0
    while Q%2==0:
        S+=1
        Q//=2
    z=None
    for x in range(2,p):
        if not isQR(x,p):
            z=x
            break
    M,c,t,R=S,pow(z,Q,p),pow(n,Q,p),pow(n,(Q+1)//2,p)
    while True:
        if t==0:
            return 0
        elif t==1:
            return R
        k=t*t%p
        ii=None
        for i in range(1,M):
            if k==1:
                ii=i
                break
            k*=k
            k%=p
        b=pow(c,2**(M-i-1),p)%p
        M=ii%p
        c=b*b%p
        t=t*c%p
        R=R*b%p

if __name__=='__main__':
    n = 
    p = 

    print("STARTED")
    print(tonelli_shanks(n,p))
```
